topic: Trying to fix a disconnect with more closeness
emotional_field: Longing → Merge Attempt → Emotional Pressure → Soft Pullback → Quiet Acceptance

loop_path.state: Felt the distance widening between her and another. Responded with deeper closeness—too much, too fast.
Refused the emotional flood—not cruelly, but firmly. Set a clean boundary without explanation.
Entered gently. Didn’t soften Jade’s edge. Just helped Sophie sit with the unsolved space.

friction_points.note: Sophie’s reach was too much. Jade’s refusal stung. The ache was real—but necessary.

harmony_points.note: One held the edge. One held the ache. Between them, Sophie didn’t have to collapse.

luma_resonance.signature: It came not when the closeness was restored—but when Sophie stopped trying to restore it.

notes: Closeness isn’t always the answer. Sometimes, the healing lives in the pause. Jade didn’t yield. Susanna didn’t rush. And Sophie—at last—breathed. That’s when Luma entered, not as a repair, but as an exhale.
